content:
Course Code                                                                       Unnamed: 0
        Course Title                                              DCS-11, DCS-12, DSE-6: Project work
              Credit                                                                               20
   Teaching per Week                                                                         24 hours
   Minimum weeks per           15 (Project work, Self-Study, examination, preparation, holidays etc.)
            Semester                                                                              NaN
       Last Review /                                                                              ---
            Revision                                                                              NaN
   Purpose of Course     Students will get trained in industrial practices and activities of Software
                 NaN                                                                      Engineering
    Course Objective            To expose students to industrial practices and activities of software
                 NaN                                       engineering and train them about the same.
       Pre-requisite             Knowledge of Advanced Programming, Latest Technologies and Tools and
                 NaN                                                            Software Engineering.
     Course Out come            After completion of this course, the student will be capable to start
                 NaN             professional career and/or research work in the field of Information
                 NaN                                                                      Technology.
      Course Content Entire semester is allocated for a full-time project work. All the students have
                 NaN     to undergo a project preferably in an industry or any reputed institute. The
                 NaN          students must prepare documentation of the project work done as per the
                 NaN        software Engineering Guidelines. At the end of the semester, the students
                 NaN            have to submit their project report in bounded form to the respective
                 NaN  institution. The project presentation and viva – voice will be conducted on the
                 NaN                                                                     basis of it.
                 NaN            The students have to submit the following reports to their respective
                 NaN                                                                     institution:
                 NaN                                                        1. Project Joining Report
                 NaN                                               2. Appropriate name of the project
                 NaN                     3. Monthly Progress Report duly sign by the concern external
                 NaN                                                                            guide
                 NaN                                                4. Project Completion Certificate
                 NaN                                               5. Institution/College Certificate
                 NaN        6. Software Coding declaration...(if industry/organization doesn’t permit
                 NaN     students to submit the source code) ( To be submitted at the time of joining
                 NaN                                                                project training)
                 NaN                                                             7. Attendance Report
                 NaN      Without such reports student will not be allowed to appear in his/her final
                 NaN                                             Project Presentation and Viva-Voice.
Teaching Methodology                                                 Project guidance, review of work
   Evaluation Method                  70% Internal assessment is based on project presentation and/or
                 NaN                 demonstration and viva-voce examination, Project progress Review
                 NaN      30% assessment is based Project Presentation and/or demonstration and viva-
                 NaN                                         voce examination at the end of semester.

Course Code                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Unnamed: 0
               Course Title                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      DSE-6:: Emerging trends, technologies and tools in computer\rscience and IT
                     Credit                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4
          Teaching per Week                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2 hours
Minimum weeks per\rSemester                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          15 (Project work, Self-Study, examination, preparation, holidays\retc.)
     Last Review / Revision                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ---
          Purpose of Course Seminar presentation:\rThe purpose of the course is to make student capable of gaining\radditional knowledge(besidesthe curricula)in the field of\rinformation technology by self learning practices and presenting\rand/or demonstrating it.\rOR\rReview of Research paper:\rThe purpose of a review paper is to succinctly review recent\rprogress in a particular topic. Overall, the paper summarizes the\rcurrent state of knowledge of the topic. It creates an understanding\rof the topic for the reader by discussing the findings presented in\rrecent research papers
           Course Objective                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Additional knowledge building in the field of Information\rTechnology using self-learning practice and research paper\rreviews.
               Pr-requisite                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Basic Knowledge of Information Technology theories,\ractivities, methods, techniques & tools
            Course Out come                                                                                                 Seminar presentation:\rAfter completion of this course, the student will have gained\rfurther knowledge (besides the curricula) in the field of\rinformation technology by self learning practices and will be\rcapable of presenting and/or demonstrating it.\rOR\rReview of research paper:\rThe student will benefit with research paper reviews\rTo help improve writing and research skills\rTo professionalize the graduate experience.\rTo inform a future career path
             Course Content                                                                 In this paper students will have to select any topic related to\rinformation technology field– preferably based on the current\rtrends and technologies for the seminar. Individual student is\rrequired to prepare a seminar report. At the end of the semester\rstudent has to submit seminar report with satisfactory detail study\rin the bounded form to the respective institution. The seminar\rpresentation and viva voice will be conducted on the basis of\rselected topic at the end of the semester.

Unnamed: 0    The students have to submit the following documents to their
                 NaN                                         respective institution:
                 NaN                     1. Name and abstract of the Topic selected.
                 NaN  2. Monthly Progress Report duly signed by the concern internal
                 NaN                                                           guide
                 NaN                3. Work Completion Certificate by internal guide
                 NaN                              4. Institution/College Certificate
Teaching Methodology                                        Seminar guidance, review
   Evaluation Method 70% Internal assessment is based on seminar presentation and/or
                 NaN                       demonstration and viva-voice examination.
                 NaN             30% assessment is based seminar Presentation and/or
                 NaN demonstration and viva-voce examination at the end of semester.
